msg: DERBY-6462  Provide more information about database name and path syntax

author: veithen
msg: Refactored the OSGi test: the test code itself doesn't need to run in the OSGi container and we don't need to install a probe. Instead, we just need to run the container and send SOAP requests to the services deployed in the container.

author: rhillegas
msg: DERBY-6500: Add ORDER BY clauses to the queries in AutoIncrementTest in order to eliminate row ordering diffs in the test results; commit derby-6500-01-aa-addOrderByClauses.diff.
